roleset.name: extremely funny
roleset.note: HILARIOUS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, funny-j.01 (from hilarious.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: But this notion that the campaign is to be blamed for her disastrous coming out party is hilarious .
example.arg: this notion that the campaign is to be blamed for her disastrous coming out party
